page.title: 10Norton Secondary School
page.content:
The school follows a ten day eighty period timetable, the first year being mixed ability, the second year banded and the third streamed. In the fourth and fifth years a series of options enables individual timetables to be followed, including options,of games.
Accumulated merits are rewarded by certificates and treats, demerits by detentions, report cards and interviews with Tutors, Year Masters, Deputy Heads.
All senior pupils participate in a programme ofCareers and Social Education. All pupils are expected to do homework and carry a 'diary' in which merits, demerits, staff and parental reports and comments are recorded.There is an elected pupils' School Council with advisory powers.
